miningBreaksPlayerProtectedBlocks.#Comment: Should BuildCraft miners be allowed to break blocks using player-specific protection?

itemLifespan.#Comment: How long, in seconds, should items stay on the ground? (Vanilla = 300, default = 60)

pumpsConsumeWater.#Comment: Should pumps consume water? Enabling this will disable minor optimisations, but work properly with finite water mods.

markerMaxDistance.#Comment: How far, in minecraft blocks, should markers (volume and path) reach?

pumpMaxDistance.#Comment: How far, in minecraft blocks, should pumps reach in fluids?

miningMultiplier.#Comment: How much power should be required for all mining machines?

miningMaxDepth.#Comment:
How much further down can miners (like the quarry or the mining well) dig?
(Note: values above 256 only have an effect if a mod like cubic chunks is installed).

mjPerRf.#Comment: The MJ to RF conversion constant (how much MJ is needed per 1 RF)

powerMode.#Comment:
Controls how BuildCraft handles Power.
There are three options:

'MJ_ONLY' - the default, all buildcraft machines only accept or generate MJ. This does NOT affect the MJ Dynamo or RF Engine, which can be enabled.

'MJ_AUTOCONVERT_RF' - buildcraft machnes accept MJ or RF, and generate MJ and self-convert to RF for RF accepting machines

'DISPLAY_RF' - identical to 'MJ_AUTOCONVERT_RF', but also displays MJ as RF in all buildcraft machines.

useColouredLabels.#Comment: Should colours be displayed as their own (or a similar) colour in tooltips?

useHighContrastColouredLabels.#Comment: Should colours displayed in tooltips use higher-contrast colours?

hidePowerValues.#Comment: Should all power values (MJ, MJ/t) be hidden?

hideFluidValues.#Comment: Should all fluid values (Buckets, mB, mB/t) be hidden?

useBucketsStatic.#Comment: Should static fluid values be displayed in terms of buckets rather than thousandths of a bucket? (B vs mB)

useBucketsFlow.#Comment: Should flowing fluid values be displayed in terms of buckets per second rather than thousandths of a bucket per tick? (B/s vs mB/t)

useLongLocalizedName.#Comment: Should localised strings be displayed in long or short form (10 mB / t vs 10 milli buckets per tick

timeGap.#Comment: Should localised strings be displayed in terms of seconds (1 MJ/s) or ticks (20 MJ/t)

itemRenderRotation.#Comment: The rotation that items use when travelling through pipes. Set to 'enabled' for full rotation, 'disabled' for no rotation, or 'horizontals_only' to only rotate items when going horizontally.

useSwappableSprites.#Comment: Disable this if you get texture errors with optifine. Disables some texture switching functionality when changing config options such as colour blind mode.

guideItemSearchLimit.#Comment: The maximum number of items that the guide book will index.

enableAnimatedSprites.#Comment: Disable this if you get sub-standard framerates due to buildcraftcore's ~60 sprites animating every frame.

enable.#Comment: Should BuildCraft generate anything in the world?
